page.discussion: ERROR_CODE_GET() returns the Error_Number of the most recent run-time error. If the last error was a DOS error, ERROR_CODE_GET() will return error number 1000. You can then use ERROR_TEXT_GET(2000) to obtain the corresponding DOS error message. Limitations Desktop applications only.
page.example:
on error goto display_error 'put Xbasic code here '-------------------- end display_error: err = error_code_get()
msg = error_text_get(err)
ui_msg_box("Error", msg + str(err)) end
